H0.text: Which nation boasts the world's longest running TV sports show, Hockey Night, first aired 1952. United States

H1.text: Which nation boasts the world's longest running TV sports show, Hockey Night, first aired 1952. Sweden

H2.text: Which nation boasts the world's longest running TV sports show, Hockey Night, first aired 1952. Russia

H3.text: Which nation boasts the world's longest running TV sports show, Hockey Night, first aired 1952. ᑲᓇᑕ

A4.text: Hockey Night in Canada began airing on Saturday nights on CBC Television in 1952.

A5.text: Hockey Night in Canada (often abbreviated Hockey Night or HNiC) is a long-running program of broadcast ice hockey play-by-play coverage in Canada.
